description:
Made from a canvas of 65% recycled polyester and 35% cotton this jacket features a waterproof membrane that can withstand all weather conditions. Its removable hood, secured by a zipper and equipped with a drawstring, adds versatility to the design. The forearms and front pockets are reinforced with recycled polyester canvas, enhancing their durability. The inner lining and 600g insulation are crafted from 100% certified recycled polyester, ensuring comfort and sustainability.

The jacket features two flap pockets, four hands warmer pockets, and three interior pockets, providing ample space to keep your hands cozy and store your tools and personal objects. With an adjustable drawstring at the bottom and ribbed inner cuffs, it's designed to preserve your warmth during frigid weather. Undoubtedly the pinnacle of our collections, the Yukon jacket is prepared to accompany you on all your winter expeditions, displaying unparalleled strength and endurance.
name: Hooke Yukon Jacket - Mens
